alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 8:32PM CDT until May 19 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Kittson, Walsh, Pembina and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 40.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Monday was 41.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 37.1 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
